description: This file defines the LoginScreen widget for a Flutter app, implementing user login functionality with form validation, state management, and UI components.

classes.name: LoginScreen
classes.description: A StatefulWidget that provides the user login screen with email and password input fields.

methods.name: createState
methods.description: Creates the mutable state for this widget.

methods.name: _LoginScreenState
methods.description: State class for LoginScreen, managing form state, user input, and login submission.

methods.name: dispose
methods.description: Disposes of the controllers when the widget is removed from the tree.

methods.name: _onSubmit
methods.description: Handles form submission, triggering login and showing error messages if login fails.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the login form UI, including input fields and submit button.
